longBusinessSummary: Spencer's Retail Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in developing, conducting, investing, and promoting organized retail business through departmental and neighborhood stores under various formats in India. The company offers products in various categories, such as groceries, food, personal care, home, electrical and electronics, fashion and accessories, specialities, home essentials, general merchandise, apparel, staples, and fast-moving consumer goods. It also engages in the online retail business. It provides its products under the own brands, including Smart Choice, Tasty Wonders, Clean Home, and Maroon, as well as under the various private brands, such as Island Monks, Mark Nicolas, Asankhya, Scorez, La Bonita, and Island Monks Kids. The company was formerly known as RP-SG Retail Limited and changed its name to Spencer's Retail Limited in December 2018. Spencer's Retail Limited was founded in 1863 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
